TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ToOrFromRuleCondition implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._ToOrFromRuleCondition

summary.span: 表示一个规则条件的发件人或收件人的邮件中，指定，位于中指定的收件人列表。

span.span: Represents a rule condition that the sender or the recipeints of the message, as specified by , is in the recipients list specified in .

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .
ToOrFromRuleCondition is derived from the object.

para.span: 每个规则与对象具有属性和。

span.span: Each rule is associated with a object which has a property and a .

para.span: 这两个属性总是返回一个 ToOrFromRuleCondition 对象。

span.span: Each of these properties always returns a ToOrFromRuleCondition object.

para.span: ToOrFromRuleCondition.ConditionType 区分这些规则条件。

span.span: ToOrFromRuleCondition.ConditionType distinguishes between these rule conditions.

para.span: 如果规则具有下列任一规则条件启用，则会为True。

span.span: If the rule has any of these rule conditions enabled, then would be True.

para.span: 有关指定规则条件的详细信息，请参阅指定规则条件

span.span: For more information on specifying rule conditions, see Specifying Rule Conditions
